definition: Mt Emei in Sichuan, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Samantabhadra 普賢|普贤
lofty/name of a mountain
see 峨嵋山[E2 mei2 Shan1]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Emeishan city in Sichuan

sentences.english: Under Emei Mountain a few people passed.
We are going to Mount Emei on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五我們打算去峨嵋山。

sentences.english: A view of Mt. Fuji can be obtained from here.
sentences.chinese: 從這兒可以看到峨嵋山。

sentences.english: She says (that) she has never been to Mount Emei.
sentences.chinese: 她說她從來沒有去過峨嵋山。

sentences.english: Chengdu. I decided to go and see the big Buddha in Leshan and Mount Emei.
sentences.chinese: 我決定去看樂山大佛和峨嵋山。

sentences.english: We went to Emei Mountain for honeymoon.
sentences.chinese: 到美麗的峨嵋山去度蜜月。

sentences.english: I decided to go and see the big Buddha in leshan and Mount Emei.
sentences.chinese: 我決定去參觀樂山大佛和峨嵋山。

sentences.english: The Greens to Mount Emei for a trip.
sentences.chinese: 格林一家正考慮雲峨嵋山旅遊。

sentences.english: Did you say that you went to Mount Emei ?
sentences.chinese: 你是說你去了峨嵋山嗎？

sentences.english: This paper reports and analyses the decline state of the Abies fabri forest in Mountain Emei.
sentences.chinese: 報道和分析了峨嵋山冷杉森林的衰退狀況。

sentences.english: I'm actually a snake spirit from Emei Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 妻本是峨嵋山苦苦修煉一蛇仙。

sentences.english: The next morning, we climbed Mount Emei.
sentences.chinese: 次日早上，我們去爬峨嵋山。

sentences.english: Last year we went to Emei and visited Yunan Provice.
sentences.chinese: 去年我們去了峨嵋山，參觀了雲南規模。

definition: Mt Emei in Sichuan, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Samantabhadra 普賢|普贤[Pu3 xian2]/Emeishan city

Mt Tiantai near Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴[Shao4 xing1] in Zhejiang, the center of Tiantai Buddhism 天台宗[Tian1 tai2 zong1]
Wudang Mountain range in northwest Hubei
Mt Jiuhua in Anhui, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Kṣitigarbha 地藏
Zhongnan Mountains, near Xi'an/also known as the Taiyi Mountains
Mt Hua in Shaanxi, western mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
Zhongnan mountains, near Xi'an
Kunlun Mountain range
mountain of Immortals
name of a peak by the Three Gorges 長江三峽|长江三峡[Chang2 Jiang1 San1 xia2]
Daoist temple
Mt Wutai in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1], one of the Four Sacred Mountains and home of the Bodhimanda of Manjushri 文殊[Wen2 shu1]
Mt Heng in Shanxi, northern mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]/Hengshan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
Mt Potala at Zhoushan 舟山市 in Zhejiang, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Guanyin 觀音|观音 (Avalokiteśvara)
